analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśat saṃvara stutiḥ
śrī saṃvaram mahāvīram vārāhīm ca api yoginīm
namāmi sarva bhāvena yoginī jāla nāyakam

original: ḍākinīṃ ca tathā lāmāṃ khaṇḍarohāṃ ca rūpiṇīm |
analyzed: ḍākinīm ca tathā lāmām khaṇḍarohām ca rūpiṇīm
caturaḥ amṛta bhāṇḍān ca bodhi cittena pūritān
pullīra malaya udbhūtam khaṇḍa kapāla saṃvaram
pracaṇḍa āliṅgaṇam vīram namāmi śirasi sthitam
jālandharāt samutpannam mahā kaṃkāla saṃvaram
caṇḍālī āliṅgaṇam vīram śikhā deśe sthitam name
oḍiyānāt samudbhūtam kaṃkāla nāma saṃvaram
prabhāvatī samāpannam savya karṇa sthitam name
arbuda pīṭha madhya stham saṃvaram vikaṭa daṃṣṭriṇam
mahā nāsā samāpannam pṛṣṭha deśe sthitam name  /
saṃpuṭam vīramatī ākhyā vāma karṇa sthitam name
rāma īśvara udbhavam vīram amitābha ākhya saṃvaram
laṅkeśvarī samāpannam namāmi netra koṇa gam
mārava ākhyāt samutpannam vajradeha ākhya saṃvaram
druma chāyā samāpannam namāmi skandha deśa gam
kāmarūpa udbhavam vīram aṅgulikā ākhya saṃvaram
airāvatī samāpannam namāmi kakṣa deśa gam
okāra sthāna saṃjātam vajra jaṭila saṃvaram
bhairava āliṅgaṇam vīram tanu yuga udbhavam name
triśakunī adbhavam nātham mahāvīra ākhya saṃvaram
vāyu vega asamāpannam nābhi deśa sthitam name
kauśalāyām samudbhūtam vajra hūkāra saṃvaram
kaliṅga pīṭha saṃjātam suprabha nāma saṃvaram
śyāmā devī samāpannam namāmi mukha bhāga jam
lampāka sthāna saṃbhūtam vajraprabha ākhya saṃvaram
su bhadra āliṅgaṇam vīram kaṇṭha deśa udbhavam name
kāñcī ākhya pīṭha saṃjātam mahā bhairava saṃvaram
hayakarṇā samāpannam namāmi hṛdimadhya gam
himālaya udbhavam vīram virūpākṣa ākhya saṃvaram
khaga ānanā samāpannam meḍhra sthāna gatam name  /
preta puryām samudbhūtam mahābala ākhya saṃvaram
cakra vegā samāpannam liṅga sthāna gatam name
guha deśāt samudbhūtam ratna vajra ākhya saṃvaram
khaṇḍarohā samāpannam namāmi guda madhya gam
saurāṣṭra deśa saṃbhūtam hayagrīva ākhya saṃvaram
śauṇḍinya āliṅgaṇam vīram namāmi uru madhya gam
suvarṇadvīpa saṃjātam ākāśagarbha saṃvaram
cakravarmiṇī samāpannam jaṅghā madhya gatam name
nagara pīṭha madhya stham śrī heruka ākhya saṃvaram
su vīra āliṅgaṇam vīram namāmi aṅguli vartinam
sindhu deśa samudbhūtam padmanṛtya ākhya saṃvaram
mahā balāsam āpannam pāda pṛṣṭha gatam name
marutī pīṭha saṃjātam vairocana ākhya saṃvaram
cakravartinī samāpannam namāmi aṅguṣṭha madhya gam
kula tāyāḥ samudbhūtam vajrasattva ākhya saṃvaram
pūrva dvāre sthitam vīram vajracaṇḍa ākhya saṃvaram
kāka āsya āliṅgaṇam vīram namāmi sura nāyakam
uttara dvāra madhya stham vajrānala ākhya saṃvaram
ulūka āsyā samāpannam namāmi yakṣa nāyakam
paścima dvāra madhya stham vajra uṣṇīṣa ākhya saṃvaram
śvānāsyā sampuṭam vīram namāmi pannaga adhipam
dakṣiṇa dvāra madhya stham vajra kuṇḍali saṃvaram
śūkara āsyā samāpannam namāmi yama nāyakam
āgneya diś vimātra stham vajrayakṣa ākhya saṃvaram
nairṛtya diś vibhāṣa stham vajrakīla ākhya saṃvaram
yamadūtī samāpannam namāmi rākṣasa adhipam
yama daṃṣṭrī samāpannam namāmi pavanādhipam
īśāna diś vibhāga stham vajra bhīṣaṇa saṃvaram
yama mathanī samāpannam namāmi bhūtanāyakam
etān devān namasyāmi diś vidikṣu su saṃsthitān
vīrān vīra īśvarīḥ sarvāḥ herukam parameśvaram
sahaja ānanda ātmakam devam viśuddham tāṇḍava anvitam
ḍākinī jāla madhya stham pratyātma vedya gocaram
stutvā idam devatī cakram yat mayā upārjitam śubham
tena puṇyena vajraḍāka parāyaṇaḥ
śrī ṣaṭtriṃśat saṃvara gaṇa cakra maṇḍala stutiḥ samāptāḥ
